description: Temperatures drop, but your desire to be outside doesn’t. Built for colder conditions and designed for trail runs and other high-output activities, the versatile Motus AR Hoody is a first layer that provides essential thermal performance, moisture management and soft comfort. Its Phasic AR II material pulls moisture off the body, provides stretch freedom, and is Merrow stitched for a smooth finish next to the skin. The fitted hood adds warmth, and the articulated trim fit frees you move at speed.
name: Arcteryx Motus AR Hoody - Mens
